product_name: Liberty Bottleworks Kraken Aluminum Water Bottle with Sport Top - Kid's - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: The Liberty Bottleworks Kraken Aluminum water bottle with Sport Top features a spill-resistant design and fun graphics to keep you and your kids happy. Made in the United States from 100% recycled aluminum; all materials used are 100% BPA free. Just flip the valve up, tip the bottle and sip, or remove the cap entirely and drink straight from the bottle. Food-grade silicone O-ring in the cap limits leaks. Food-grade polyester powder coat on the inside of the bottle is BPA free. Liberty Bottleworks Kraken Aluminum water bottle with Sport Top holds 16 fl. oz. Hand washing recommended.
short_description: The Liberty Bottleworks Kraken Aluminum water bottle with Sport Top features a spill-resistant design and fun graphics to keep you and your kids happy.
